程序包 engine

类 CurrentOperator

java.lang.Object
engine.CurrentOperator
所有已实现的接口:
Subscriber
public class CurrentOperator extends Object implements Subscriber
The class represents the person who are interacting with our system. This class is like an agent that can be used by actors to contact with the system.(will be more security) The current user is the user that is currently logged in. (might be the resident or the Administrators/receptionist ...)

    • playTurn

      public Service playTurn(Services services, Service lastService)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      参数:
      services - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastService - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      返回:
      the Action to be performed

    • broadCast

      public void broadCast(Publisher publisher, String message, String facilityId)
      从接口复制的说明: Subscriber
      Broadcast the message to all the subscribers(except the sender)
      指定者:
      broadCast 在接口中 Subscriber
      参数:
      publisher - - the publisher of the message
      message - - the message to be broadcasted
      facilityId - - the facility id of the publisher if the id is null, then broadcast to all the subscribers if the id is not null, then broadcast to all the subscribers who work on the specified facility
